sentence.Network_en: John Steed was an arrogant, swaggering young man.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰·斯蒂德是一个傲慢狂妄的年轻人。

sentence.Network_en: Never is a steed pigsty - born ; nor an evergreen pine potbound.
sentence.Network_cn: 猪圈岂生千里马,花盆难养万年松.

sentence.Network_cn: 一个骑士骑在装饰华丽的马上.

entry.def: A steed is a large strong horse used for riding.

means.word_mean: 1. (literary) a spirited horse for state or war
